mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vendor ( vendor_no, vendor_name, vendor_category_code_no, usage_status_code_no, vendor_phone, vendor_tel, representative_name, address, zip_code, detail_address, bank_code_no, vendor_account_no, account_holder ) VALUES ( seq_vendor_no.NEXTVAL, #{vendorName}, #{vendorCategoryCodeNo}, '01', #{vendorPhone}, #{vendorTel}, #{representativeName}, #{address}, #{zipCode}, #{detailAddress}, #{vendorAccount.bankCodeNo}, #{vendorAccount.accountNo}, #{vendorAccount.accountHolder} )
mapper.select: SELECT vendor_no, vendor_name, vendor_category_code_no, vendor_category_code_name, vendor_phone, vendor_tel, representative_name, address, zip_code, detail_address, bank_code_no, bank_code_name, vendor_account_no, account_holder FROM vendor WHERE vendor_no = #{value}

SELECT vendor_no, vendor_name, vendor_category_code_no, vendor_category_code_name, vendor_phone, vendor_tel, representative_name, address, zip_code, detail_address, bank_code_no, bank_code_name, vendor_account_no, account_holder FROM vendor
AND vendor_no = #{searchKeyword} OR LOWER(vendor_name) LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND usage_status_code_no = #{usageCondition}
ORDER BY vendor_no ASC
